attributes.action: not pay council tax on empty property after a death
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am a pentioner and my mum has just died and I am having to pay full council tax on her empty flat which I am trying to sell but with the property downturn its proving difficult. It is obscene when a single person receives 25 per cent reduction a property with students pays nothing as does anyone on benifits,
